title: Why is the Indian music industry the worst? - Quora

response.answer_text: The people who doesn’t get the Indian music industry makes the industry worst. In some of the record labels, If you’re willing to purchase a license For a particular song, they will respond to your mail. A license is something, which holds the permission to use the particular song, in your video/or any of your works, without any hesitation Music Publishing doesn’t even work in India, music publishing is something to deal with the lyrics and melody not the sound recording but no body cares about it at all. Instance 1: The people. I run a record label ( Abstract Medias ) , most of the artists submit Original songs, but some artists submit remix & cover of another song, people upload covers/remix of another song, not kidding the covers/remix they submit is really awesome. The covers/remix doesn’t contains any original sound recording since and guess what they still get claimed, why? Because it contains the lyrics/melody or both. I legitimately say my people that “you can’t just cover or remix a song without a license”, after a while realizing that the license cost is higher, they say “dude the license is too high in price, I won’t spend on this crap” I usually reply; “but dude you’re remix/cover is awesome why won’t you just spend your money on license, and release the song?“ and they never release that awesome mix ever again. Instance 2: The record label.Some of the record labels doesn’t even have a option to purchase a license or educate the people that they can use their music in their works without getting a copyright infringement. Popular labels like Universal Music Group (UMG) have a separate page about who can License the music and why you need music license. Instance 3: The people again. have you ever had a friend who downloads every latest songs for free? Well i have one. Some of us don’t even support an artist, if you like someone’s music, you can purchase it or at least stream them in Spotify or JioSaavn (app) to support the artist. so these are the reasons that Indian Music Industry is the worst, like i said before The people who doesn’t get the Indian music industry makes the industry worst.
